body:
Heyllo Pvpers!

Tomorrow night is Round 2 of the OCN Tournament that I am participating in. Is it against the rules to advertise the streamer's channel so that people on Avicus will watch?

UPDATE: nvm not gonna do it, disregard this topic pls

title: Is this against the rules?

replies.body: I want to watch. Post it on Retaliation clan chat please :)
replies.body_tagged: I want to watch. Post it on Retaliation clan chat please :)

replies.body: it's probably illegal. if you really want people to watch us go ask them on skype, not here. I don't like attention craving.

replies.body: That's a nice team. In my opinion, it wouldn't probably be allowed because of the fact it's streaming a server not tantamount to Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: That's a nice team. In my opinion, it wouldn't probably be allowed because of the fact it's streaming a server not tantamount to Avicus.

replies.body: I don't see why it would be a problem.. if anything Avicus players can learn a thing or two for the upcoming tournament.

replies.body: I'd post it here. I'm petty sure it's allowed. Like Zoom said, you might learn something by watching

replies.body: Read the update in the OP pls. If u want the link, PM me on Skype (higgerblick5)

replies.body: If you aren't going to be doing this anymore, I'll lock the the topic to prevent any further spam. :)
